searchDocs.title: CheckRateâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> ZoneManager.CheckRate: number The rate in which zones are checked

searchDocs.title: Zonesâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> ZoneManager.Zones: {[ZoneRef]:Â ZoneInfo} Table of all currently active zones

searchDocs.title: OnEnteredâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> ZoneManager.OnEntered: Signal<( Player , ZoneInfo )> Fires when a player enters a zone Example: ZoneManager.OnEntered:Connect(function(Player: Player, Zone: ZoneInfo) if Zone.Name == "ForbiddenZone" then Player:Kick("You entered the forbidden zone ðŸ¤¯") end end)

searchDocs.title: OnEnteredâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> ZoneManager.OnEntered: Signal<( Player , ZoneInfo )> Fires when a player exits a zone Example: ZoneManager.OnExited:Connect(function(Player: Player, Zone: ZoneInfo) if Zone.Name == "SafeZone" then Player:SetAttribute("Safe", false) end end)

searchDocs.title: Registerâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> ZoneManager:Register(ZoneRef:Â ZoneRef) â†’Â () Creates a 'ZoneInfo' object and pushes the object to the cache aka ZoneManager.Zones. This method is called automatically for zones registered using the CollectionService tag 'Zone'

searchDocs.title: Deregisterâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> ZoneManager:Deregister(ZoneRef:Â ZoneRef) â†’Â () Removes the provided ZoneRef from the cache and also cleans the ZoneInfo object

searchDocs.title: â€‹
searchDocs.content: interface ZoneInfo { Active:Â boolean, Name:Â string, Ref:Â ZoneRef, Occupants:Â {Player } }  Attempts to get the zone the player is currently in
